XIII.i.3.D.2.a
.
Income Limitation for Eligibility for Medications
Per
38 U.S.C. 1712(d)
, the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) continues to furnish outpatient medications to Veterans entitled to A&A, including those reduced under
38 CFR 3.552(b)(1)
, whose income exceeds the applicable limit by no more than $1,000.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D - Eligibility for Medical Services Associated With Aid and Attendance (A&A) or Housebound Status
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D
